saying: Eucalyptus is the spice of life.
description: Lyman is a jock, koala villager in the Animal Crossing series. He is first introduced in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. His picture quote, “Eucalyptus is the spice of life," refers to his being a koala, as eucalyptus is the main part of a koala's diet. His name may come from the word "lime," referring to his green color.
